mapper.sql: id, groupId, enrollId, userId, nickName, remark, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE biz_enroll_user
groupId = #{map.groupId},
enrollId = #{map.enrollId},
userId = #{map.userId},
nickName = #{map.nickName},
remark = #{map.remark},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM biz_enroll_user
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND groupId like CONCAT('%', #{groupId} , '%')
AND enrollId like CONCAT('%', #{enrollId} , '%')
AND userId like CONCAT('%', #{userId} , '%')
AND nickName like CONCAT('%', #{nickName} , '%')
AND remark like CONCAT('%', #{remark} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
